entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
